pr_title: Fix: Listing projects comprising of only the user's on listAll=true

timeline.bodyText: why should they both be specified? user + either implies the other
timeline.author: DaanHoogland

replies.bodyText: discussed off-line with @Pearl1594 . no functional need but bugs may arise when not implemented this way
replies.author: DaanHoogland

timeline.bodyText: @Pearl1594 update this msg to reflect the change in cond.
timeline.author: sureshanaparti

replies.bodyText: It already did, as far as I can tell, neither accountId nor domainId may be null so both must be specified.
replies.author: DaanHoogland

replies.bodyText: am i missing anything here @DaanHoogland , the cond. is OR and the msg says both (account id and domain id).
replies.author: sureshanaparti

replies.bodyText: throw an exception when either is null, would mean both may not be null. The message was already the (not yet implemented) new condition.
replies.author: DaanHoogland
